Title: A Direct Violation of the Principle of Humanity
Notes: A Direct Violation of the Principle of Humanity - We will not tolerate that Military force slaughters humanity.This poster was issued by the Beijing United Medical Students Association in Support of the Shanghai Incident (Beijing Xiehe Yixue Xuesheng Hu'an Houyuanhui - 北京协和医学学生沪案后援会).
